Articles.Content: Hello! For my engineering class I got to design my own coin. I couldn't think of anything better than Ksp. I love the retro patch so thats what I put on it. Hope you guys like it. [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/mcCaRB1.jpg[/IMG]Sorry for the picture not being the right orientation :rolleyes:

Looks very nice! This would be a great design for Funds if they are ever shown as physical money in the game.[COLOR=#333333][I]
[/I][/COLOR] Edited November 24, 2015 by Rthsom

Thanks! Much appreciated. [QUOTE][COLOR=#333333]This would be a great design for Funds if they are ever shown as physical money in the game.[/COLOR][/QUOTE] It would be a great poker chip or something. I personally don't have a thousand dollar 3d printer lying around... so that might not happen.
If this were a metal coin I would buy it in a heartbeat.

Someone give this man a metal printer!

Also, did you forget to put a high-density skin on top, or was that intentional? It looks a bit like structural densities, not skin.

[quote name='0111narwhalz']Someone give this man a metal printer!

Also, did you forget to put a high-density skin on top, or was that intentional? It looks a bit like structural densities, not skin.[/QUOTE]
That is our school's 3d printer. The printer is pretty old and isn't the most specific. There would be a skin if I could
